00013 SEM_ID I2C::m_semaphore = NULL;

00021 I2C::I2C(DigitalModule *module, UINT8 deviceAddress)
00022     : m_module (module)
00023     , m_deviceAddress (deviceAddress)
00024     , m_compatibilityMode (false)
00025 {
00026     if (m_semaphore == NULL)
00027     {
00028         m_semaphore = semMCreate(SEM_Q_PRIORITY | SEM_DELETE_SAFE | SEM_INVERSION_SAFE);
00029     }
00030 }

00050 bool I2C::Transaction(UINT8 *dataToSend, UINT8 sendSize, UINT8 *dataReceived, UINT8 receiveSize)
00051 {
00052     if (sendSize > 6)
00053     {
00054         wpi_fatal(I2CByteCountError);
00055         return true;
00056     }
00057     if (receiveSize > 7)
00058     {
00059         wpi_fatal(I2CByteCountError);
00060         return true;
00061     }
00062 
00063     UINT32 data=0;
00064     UINT32 dataHigh=0;
00065     UINT32 i;
00066     for(i=0; i<sendSize && i<sizeof(data); i++)
00067     {
00068         data |= (UINT32)dataToSend[i] << (8*i);
00069     }
00070     for(; i<sendSize; i++)
00071     {
00072         dataHigh |= (UINT32)dataToSend[i] << (8*(i-sizeof(data)));
00073     }
00074 
00075     bool aborted = true;
00076     {
00077         Synchronized sync(m_semaphore);
00078         m_module->m_fpgaDIO->writeI2CConfig_Address(m_deviceAddress, &status);
00079         m_module->m_fpgaDIO->writeI2CConfig_BytesToWrite(sendSize, &status);
00080         m_module->m_fpgaDIO->writeI2CConfig_BytesToRead(receiveSize, &status);
00081         if (sendSize > 0) m_module->m_fpgaDIO->writeI2CDataToSend(data, &status);
00082         if (sendSize > sizeof(data)) m_module->m_fpgaDIO->writeI2CConfig_DataToSendHigh(dataHigh, &status);
00083         m_module->m_fpgaDIO->writeI2CConfig_BitwiseHandshake(m_compatibilityMode, &status);
00084         UINT8 transaction = m_module->m_fpgaDIO->readI2CStatus_Transaction(&status);
00085         m_module->m_fpgaDIO->strobeI2CStart(&status);
00086         while(transaction == m_module->m_fpgaDIO->readI2CStatus_Transaction(&status)) taskDelay(1);
00087         while(!m_module->m_fpgaDIO->readI2CStatus_Done(&status)) taskDelay(1);
00088         aborted = m_module->m_fpgaDIO->readI2CStatus_Aborted(&status);
00089         if (receiveSize > 0) data = m_module->m_fpgaDIO->readI2CDataReceived(&status);
00090         if (receiveSize > sizeof(data)) dataHigh = m_module->m_fpgaDIO->readI2CStatus_DataReceivedHigh(&status);
00091     }
00092 
00093     for(i=0; i<receiveSize && i<sizeof(data); i++)
00094     {
00095         dataReceived[i] = (data >> (8*i)) & 0xFF;
00096     }
00097     for(; i<receiveSize; i++)
00098     {
00099         dataReceived[i] = (dataHigh >> (8*(i-sizeof(data)))) & 0xFF;
00100     }
00101     return aborted;
00102 }
00103 
00112 bool I2C::AddressOnly()
00113 {
00114     return Transaction(NULL, 0, NULL, 0);
00115 }
00116 
00127 bool I2C::Write(UINT8 registerAddress, UINT8 data)
00128 {
00129     UINT8 buffer[2];
00130     buffer[0] = registerAddress;
00131     buffer[1] = data;
00132     return Transaction(buffer, sizeof(buffer), NULL, 0);
00133 }
00134 
00148 bool I2C::Read(UINT8 registerAddress, UINT8 count, UINT8 *buffer)
00149 {
00150     if (count < 1 || count > 7)
00151     {
00152         wpi_fatal(I2CByteCountError);
00153         return true;
00154     }
00155     if (buffer == NULL)
00156     {
00157         wpi_fatal(NullParameter);
00158         return true;
00159     }
00160 
00161     return Transaction(&registerAddress, sizeof(registerAddress), buffer, count);
00162 }

00174 }

00184 void I2C::SetCompatibilityMode(bool enable)
00185 {
00186     m_compatibilityMode = enable;

00202 bool I2C::VerifySensor(UINT8 registerAddress, UINT8 count, const UINT8 *expected)
00203 {
00204     // TODO: Make use of all 7 read bytes
00205     UINT8 deviceData[4];
00206     for (UINT8 i=0, curRegisterAddress = registerAddress; i < count; i+=4, curRegisterAddress+=4)
00207     {
00208         UINT8 toRead = count - i < 4 ? count - i : 4;
00209         // Read the chunk of data.  Return false if the sensor does not respond.
00210         if (Read(curRegisterAddress, toRead, deviceData)) return false;
00211 
00212         for (UINT8 j=0; j<toRead; j++)
00213         {
00214             if(deviceData[j] != expected[i + j]) return false;
00215         }
00216     }
00217     return true;
00218 }
